thread.title: Miller gets 36th shutout as Canucks blank Kings 3-0
thread.title_full: Miller gets 36th shutout as Canucks blank Kings 3-0

title: Miller gets 36th shutout as Canucks blank Kings 3-0
text:
Miller gets 36th shutout as Canucks blank Kings 3-0 Adam Cracknell scored his second goal in two games for Vancouver. Post to Facebook Miller gets 36th shutout as Canucks blank Kings 3-0 Adam Cracknell scored his second goal in two games for Vancouver.  //www.king5.com/story/sports/2015/10/14/vancouver-canucks-kings-hockey-nhl-miller/73912936/   Join the Conversation To   Miller gets 36th shutout as Canucks blank Kings 3-0 By GREG BEACHAM AP Hockey Writer 11:37 p.m. PDT October 13, 2015 Oct 13, 2015; Los Angeles, CA, USA; Vancouver Canucks right wing Jannik Hansen (36), defenseman Dan Hamhuis (2), right wing Adam Cracknell (24), defenseman Matt Bartkowski (44) and right wing Brandon Prust (9) are greeted at the bench after a goal in the second period of the game against the Los Angeles Kings at Staples Center. Mandatory Credit: Jayne Kamin-Oncea-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Jayne Kamin-Oncea, Jayne Kamin-Oncea-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LOS ANGELES (AP) - Ryan Miller made 15 saves in his 36th career shutout, Adam Cracknell scored his second goal in two games, and the Vancouver Canucks completed a Southern California sweep with a 3-0 victory over the winless Los Angeles Kings on Tuesday night. 
Alexander Edler scored and Derek Dorsett added an empty-net goal for the Canucks, who followed up a 2-1 shootout win over Anaheim on Monday by improving to 3-0-1 in the young season. 
Miller is off to a strong start after matching his career high with six shutouts last season, his first with the Canucks. 
Jonathan Quick stopped 23 shots for struggling Los Angeles, which has been outscored 11-2 while losing three straight home games to open the season. Read or Share this story: http://www.king5.com/story/sports/2015/10/14/vancouver-canucks-kings-hockey-nhl-miller/73912936/ TOP VIDEOS
